title: Women's
textBeforeTable: GORE Bike Wear & Running Wear Size chart 1 year Manufacturer Warranty: road cycling, mtb Recommended Use: half-length Zip: 3 Pockets: club Fit: [body] 86% nylon, 14% elastane, [panels] polyester Material: Tech Specs The Gore Bike Wear Women's Phantom Summer Singlet is available in White/fuchsia, White/black, Fuchsia/white, Citrus Green/white, and Black/white. It comes in sizes from X-Small to XX-Large. The short zip with a semi-locking slider adds extra ventilation when you need to cool down fast. The zipper's underflap protects undergarments and skin from getting caught in zipper teeth and abrasion. For storage, a single zippered pocket on the back keeps your keys and ID secure during short rides. Reflective piping on the back and a logo on the front add a measure of visibility to early morning and evening rides. The Women's Phantom Summer Singlet features the same
textAfterTable: How to Measure: For best results, take measurements over your underwear. Chest: Measure under your arms, around the fullest part of your chest. Arm Length: Measure from the center of your back to your wrist with arms held out. Waist: Measure around your natural waistline, keeping the tape a bit loose. Hip: Measure around the fullest part of your body at the top of your legs. Inseam: Using pants that fit well, measure the crotch seam to the bottom of the leg.
